Home » 17A10 Dasakanipātapāḷi » 4 Catutthapaṇṇāsaka » 4.4 Ariyamaggavagga
4.4.10 Sacchikātabbasutta
Catutthapaṇṇāsaka
Ariyamaggavagga
Sacchikātabbasutta
198.
1382“Sacchikātabbañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi na sacchikātabbañca. Taṃ suṇātha…pe…  katamo ca, bhikkhave, na sacchikātabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipāto…pe…  micchādiṭṭhi—  ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, na sacchikātabbo dhammo.
1383Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sacchikātabbo dhammo? Pāṇātipātā veramaṇī…pe…  sammādiṭṭhi—  ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, sacchikātabbo dhammo”ti.
1384Dasamaṃ.
1385Ariyamaggavaggo catuttho.
<< 4.4.9 Anussaritabbasuttaup4.5 Aparapuggalavagga >>
